original_text:
Have mercy upon us, O Lord, have mercy upon us,
    for we have had more than enough of contempt.
korean_text: 여호와여 우리에게 은혜를 베푸시고 또 은혜를 베푸소서 심한 멸시가 우리에게 넘치나이다

sentences.original_text: for we have had more than enough of contempt.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 멸시를 너무 많이 받았기 때문입니다.
